item.description:
And now for something completely different: Northern dim sum!

Hot soy milk, scallion pancakes, turnip cakes, and even dumplings.

Join us for our now-monthly, all-social dimsum events. We can talk geek, and eat ourselves silly.

Alas, this is probably not for the vegetarian'd, or those following any sort of strict dietary regimen. The bill will be split evenly among all who attend, so the more the merrier/cheaper! (Cost is usually less than $15 per person.)

NOTE IF YOU ARRIVE AFTER 1:30 -- We will be inside. Shangri-La is quite small; you should see us. Street parking is available. It's also right on the route of the 73 bus out of Harvard Square.

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum Meetup!
